about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When entering traffic after being parked at a curb, you:

about.name: When entering traffic after being parked at a curb, you:

hasPart.assesses: When entering traffic after being parked at a curb, you: | When entering traffic after being parked at a curb, you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Any time that you merge into city or highway traffic, you should wait for a gap in traffic large enough for your vehicle to get up to the speed of other traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Should drive more slowly than other traffic for 200 feet.

comment.text: Should drive more slowly than other traffic for 200 feet.

suggestedAnswer.text: Should wait for a large enough gap to get up to the speed of traffic.

comment.text: Should wait for a large enough gap to get up to the speed of traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Should wait for the first two vehicles to pass, then drive into the lane.

comment.text: Should wait for the first two vehicles to pass, then drive into the lane.

acceptedAnswer.text: Should wait for a large enough gap to get up to the speed of traffic.

comment.text: Should wait for a large enough gap to get up to the speed of traffic.

answerExplanation.text: Any time that you merge into city or highway traffic, you should wait for a gap in traffic large enough for your vehicle to get up to the speed of other traffic.

comment.text: When entering traffic after being parked at a curb, you: | Any time that you merge into city or highway traffic, you should wait for a gap in traffic large enough for your vehicle to get up to the speed of other traffic.

hasPart.name: To help others see you when daylight begins to fade, you should use your:

about.name: To help others see you when daylight begins to fade, you should use your:

hasPart.assesses: To help others see you when daylight begins to fade, you should use your: | To help others see you when daylight begins to fade, you should use your: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: As daylight begins to fade, turn on your low beams to help others see you. Only use your high beam headlights in an open area where no other drivers are present.

comment.text: Parking lights.
Low beam headlights.
Emergency flashers.
Low beam headlights.

answerExplanation.text: As daylight begins to fade, turn on your low beams to help others see you. Only use your high beam headlights in an open area where no other drivers are present.

hasPart.name: If you have a sudden tire blowout:

about.name: If you have a sudden tire blowout:

hasPart.assesses: If you have a sudden tire blowout: | If you have a sudden tire blowout: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If a tire suddenly goes flat while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle moving straight. Slow down gradually by taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly.

comment.text: Use the brakes lightly.
Pump the brakes.
Apply the brakes firmly.
Use the brakes lightly.

answerExplanation.text: If a tire suddenly goes flat while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle moving straight. Slow down gradually by taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly.

comment.text: If you have a sudden tire blowout: | If a tire suddenly goes flat while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle moving straight. Slow down gradually by taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly.

hasPart.name: When changing lanes:
hasPart.assesses: When changing lanes: | When changing lanes: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Before changing lanes, you should check your side mirrors and look over your shoulder to make sure it is safe to proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check your side mirror and look over your shoulder to make sure the lane is clear.

comment.text: Check your side mirror and look over your shoulder to make sure the lane is clear.
Check the inside rearview mirror.
Slow down.

acceptedAnswer.text: Check your side mirror and look over your shoulder to make sure the lane is clear.

comment.text: Check your side mirror and look over your shoulder to make sure the lane is clear.

answerExplanation.text: Before changing lanes, you should check your side mirrors and look over your shoulder to make sure it is safe to proceed.

comment.text: When changing lanes: | Before changing lanes, you should check your side mirrors and look over your shoulder to make sure it is safe to proceed.

hasPart.name: Extra space in front of a large truck is needed for:

about.name: Extra space in front of a large truck is needed for:

hasPart.assesses: Extra space in front of a large truck is needed for: | Extra space in front of a large truck is needed for: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Because they are larger, trucks take longer to stop than cars traveling at the same speed. Other drivers should not pull in front of a truck and then slow down or stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Other drivers to merge onto the freeway.

comment.text: Other drivers to merge onto the freeway.

suggestedAnswer.text: The truck driver to stop the vehicle.

comment.text: The truck driver to stop the vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Other drivers when they want to slow down.

comment.text: Other drivers when they want to slow down.

acceptedAnswer.text: The truck driver to stop the vehicle.

comment.text: The truck driver to stop the vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: Because they are larger, trucks take longer to stop than cars traveling at the same speed. Other drivers should not pull in front of a truck and then slow down or stop.

comment.text: Extra space in front of a large truck is needed for: | Because they are larger, trucks take longer to stop than cars traveling at the same speed. Other drivers should not pull in front of a truck and then slow down or stop.

hasPart.name: You should signal continuously while turning because it:

about.name: You should signal continuously while turning because it:

hasPart.assesses: You should signal continuously while turning because it: | You should signal continuously while turning because it: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.

suggestedAnswer.text: Is illegal to turn off your signal before completing a turn.

comment.text: Is illegal to turn off your signal before completing a turn.

suggestedAnswer.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

comment.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

suggestedAnswer.text: Is always unsafe to turn off a signal before completing a turn.

comment.text: Is always unsafe to turn off a signal before completing a turn.

acceptedAnswer.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

comment.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

answerExplanation.text: You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.

comment.text: You should signal continuously while turning because it: | You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.
